Dialog Turns 2.Dialog: Nah, I prefer to look at it as the one with my ex-boyfriend and his gorgeous, successful and sophisticated girlfriend, who makes me feel like a toothless Okie.

Dialog Turns 3.Dialog: Do you want me to spill hot soup on her?

Dialog Turns 4.Speaker: Penny

Dialog Turns 5.Dialog: I know. But if she orders something low-fat I'll totally give her the full-fat version.
